ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ وَضِيَآءً وَذِكْرًا لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave to Musa and Harun the Discrimination and a Shining Light and a Reminder for those with taqwa:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, and a light and reminder for those who take heed for themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We had granted to Moses and Aaron the Criterion (between right and wrong), and Light and Admonition for the good of the God-fearing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To Moses and Aaron We granted the criteria of discerning right from wrong, and We gave them the light and a reminder to the pious ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We gave Moosa and Haroon the Judgement* and a light and an advice for the pious. (* The Holy Book Taurat.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We granted to Musa and Harun the criterion, and a shining light and a Reminder for those who have Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave to Musa and Haroun the Furqan and a light and a reminder for those who would guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We gave Moses and Aaron the Salvation and a Radiance, and a Remembrance for the godfearing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion (of right and wrong) and a light and a Reminder for those who keep from evil,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Moses and Aaron the criterion of right and wrong and a light and reminder for the righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We vcuchsafed unto Musa and Harun the distinction and illumination and an admonition for the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, a light and reminder for the Godwary
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In the past We granted to Moses and Aaron the criterion (for judgment), and a Light and a Message for those who would do right,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We granted to Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron) the criterion (of right and wrong), and a shining light [i.e. the Taurat (Torah)] and a Reminder for Al-Muttaqun (the pious - see V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, and gave them a light and a Remembrance for the cautious:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, and illumination, and a reminder for the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:48] And verily We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, the Torah that discriminates between truth and falsehood, and [between] what is lawful and unlawful, and an illumination, by it, and remembrance, an admonition therein, for those who are wary of God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We verily gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion) the deliverer from dubious matters; it is also said that the Criterion means: victory and the upper hand over Pharaoh (and a light) which shows error (and a Reader) and an admonition (for those who keep from evil) for those who ward off idolatry, disbelief and indecencies.
